name: Hexa Puzzle
description:
★★★★★ Hexa Puzzle is FUN and challenging! Let's see you find the right combination of hexa blocks!

◉ Hexa Puzzle helps you relieve stress

◉ Hexa Puzzle helps you improve your brain

◉ Hexa Puzzle is the relaxing fun you need

◉ Hexa Puzzle is the only game thats also a brain workout

◉ Play before you go to sleep and you will improve your verbal skills for the next day

◉ Its fun and good for you!
